about_the_game:
Hana’s past is shrouded in mystery, and in the demo of "MINE MEMORY," you’ll get a glimpse into the complexities of her story. This demo introduces key themes and elements from the full game, providing a look at the world that has shaped Hana's journey.

Demo Key Features:

  • A ~10 Minute Playable Teaser: Engage in the first part of the story that sets the tone and mystery of Hana’s past, hinting at the full story.

  • Atmospheric and Moody Visuals and Sound: Features detailed soundscapes, from atmospheric background music to intense sound effects. 

  • Three Unique Scenes to Explore: Play through a succession of scenes that reveal pieces of Hana's past, each offering glimpses of her internal struggles mysteries.

  • Revealing Choices: Make choices that hint at the paths in Hana’s journey, and potential future revelations. 

Experience the First Layers of Mystery and Set the Stage for Hana's Journey. The demo is an introduction to the story's psychological depth and atmosphere, paving the way for big revelations in the full game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple M1+ / Intel Core i3+
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 1536 MB+ / AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2GB+

name: Mine Memory Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 10+
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX 10+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Begin to uncover the the skeletons in Hana's closet in the MINE MEMORY, demo. Dive into Hana's memories, shape her destiny, and confront haunting choices with deep consequences.
